verses.verse: These are the journeys <S%H4550><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when they went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by their armies <S%H6635><s%> under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> their goings out <S%H4161><s%> according to their journeys <S%H4550><s%> by the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> and these are their journeys <S%H4550><s%> according to their goings out. <S%H4161><s%>

They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H7486><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the fifteenth <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month; <S%H2320><s%> on the next day <S%H4283><s%> after the Passover <S%H6453><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> with a high <S%H7311><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%>

while the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> were burying <S%H6912><s%> all their firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had struck <S%H5221><s%> among them: <S%H430><s%> on their gods also Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments. <S%H8201><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses, <S%H7486><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Etham, <S%H864><s%> which is in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Etham, <S%H864><s%> and turned back <S%H7725><s%> to Pihahiroth, <S%H6367><s%> which is before Baal Zephon: <S%H1189><s%> and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Migdol. <S%H4024><s%>

They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Hahiroth, <S%H5265><s%> and passed through <S%H5674><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> into the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> and they went <S%H3212><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey <S%H1870><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Etham, <S%H864><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Marah. <S%H4785><s%>

They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Marah, <S%H4785><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Elim: <S%H362><s%> and in Elim <S%H362><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%> springs <S%H5869><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> palm trees; <S%H8558><s%> and they encamped there. <S%H2583><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Elim, <S%H362><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin. <S%H5512><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin, <S%H5512><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Dophkah. <S%H1850><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Dophkah, <S%H1850><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Alush. <S%H442><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Alush, <S%H442><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rephidim, <S%H7508><s%> where there was no water <S%H4325><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Rephidim, <S%H7508><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Kibroth Hattaavah. <S%H6914><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Kibroth Hattaavah, <S%H6914><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Hazeroth. <S%H2698><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Hazeroth, <S%H2698><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rithmah. <S%H7575><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Rithmah, <S%H7575><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rimmon Perez. <S%H7428><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Rimmon Perez, <S%H7428><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Libnah. <S%H3841><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rissah. <S%H7446><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Rissah, <S%H7446><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Kehelathah. <S%H6954><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Kehelathah, <S%H6954><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Shepher. <S%H8234><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Shepher, <S%H8234><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Haradah. <S%H2732><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Haradah, <S%H2732><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Makheloth. <S%H4722><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Makheloth, <S%H4722><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Tahath. <S%H8480><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Tahath, <S%H8480><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Terah. <S%H8646><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Terah, <S%H8646><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Mithkah. <S%H4989><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Mithkah, <S%H4989><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Hashmonah. <S%H2832><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Hashmonah, <S%H2832><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Moseroth. <S%H4149><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Moseroth, <S%H4149><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Bene Jaakan. <S%H1142><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Bene Jaakan, <S%H1142><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Hor Haggidgad. <S%H2735><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Hor Haggidgad, <S%H2735><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Jotbathah. <S%H3193><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Jotbathah, <S%H3193><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Abronah. <S%H5684><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Abronah, <S%H5684><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Ezion Geber. <S%H6100><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Ezion Geber, <S%H6100><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> (the same is Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>).
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor, <S%H2023><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom. <S%H123><s%>

Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> into Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%> there, <S%H705><s%> in the fortieth year <S%H8141><s%> after the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the first day of the month. <S%H259><s%>
Aaron <S%H175><s%> was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he died <S%H4194><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor. <S%H2023><s%>

The Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Arad, <S%H6166><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the South <S%H5045><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of the coming <S%H935><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor, <S%H2023><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Zalmonah. <S%H6758><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Zalmonah, <S%H6758><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Punon. <S%H6325><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Punon, <S%H6325><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Oboth. <S%H88><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Oboth, <S%H88><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Iye Abarim, <S%H5863><s%> in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Iyim, <S%H5864><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Dibon Gad. <S%H1769><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Dibon Gad, <S%H1769><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Almon Diblathaim. <S%H5963><s%>
They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Almon Diblathaim, <S%H5963><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Nebo. <S%H5015><s%>

They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>
They encamped <S%H2583><s%> by the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> from Beth Jeshimoth <S%H1020><s%> even to Abel Shittim <S%H63><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H5674><s%> "When you pass over the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%>

then you shall drive out <S%H3423><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H6><s%> destroy all their stone idols, <S%H4906><s%> destroy <S%H6><s%> all their molten <S%H4541><s%> images, <S%H6754><s%> and demolish <S%H8045><s%> all their high places. <S%H1116><s%>
You shall take possession <S%H3423><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein; <S%H5414><s%> for I have given the land <S%H776><s%> to you to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

You shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> according to your families; <S%H4940><s%> to the more <S%H7227><s%> you shall give the more <S%H7227><s%> inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and to the fewer <S%H4592><s%> you shall give the less <S%H4591><s%> inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> wherever the lot <S%H1486><s%> falls <S%H3318><s%> to any man, <S%H5157><s%> that shall be his. You shall inherit according to the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

"But if you do not drive out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H3498><s%> then those you let remain of them will be as pricks <S%H7899><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%> and as thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your sides, <S%H6654><s%> and they will harass <S%H6887><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> in which you dwell. <S%H3427><s%>
It shall happen that as I thought <S%H1819><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to them, <S%H6213><s%> so will I do to you."
